abstract: Federal Election Commission lawsuit accuses former Republican Senate candidate from Delaware Christine O'Donnell of illegally using at least $20,000 in campaign contributions to pay bills at townhouse she lived and worked in.
lead_paragraph: Christine O’Donnell, a former Senate candidate and Tea Party favorite, illegally used at least $20,000 in campaign contributions to pay rent and utility bills at a townhouse where she worked and lived, according to accusations in a federal lawsuit.
snippet: Christine O’Donnell, a former Senate candidate and Tea Party favorite, illegally used at least $20,000 in campaign contributions to pay rent and utility bills at a townhouse where she worked and lived, according to accusations in a federal lawsuit.

headline.main: Delaware: Election Agency Sues Ex-Candidate Christine O’Donnell
